english.segment1: I wonder when we first bought into this. So satisfied with status quo. Have we convinced ourselves that this is all there is
english.segment2: Well all that is within me. Says we were meant to break free
english.segment3: Chorus. Live like thereÂ’s no tomorrow. Love extravagantly. Lead a life to be followed. Goodbye Ordinary. Goodbye Ordinary
english.segment4: We were never meant to compromise. Settle for mediocrity. This life was never made to be a waste of time
english.segment5: Well all that is within me. Says no more just existing
english.segment7: Bridge. No more complacency. No more just settling. This time. Goodbye to atrophy. For we were meant to be. Alive
